# containerIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier of the container to which the item belongs.

## Declaration

```swift
var containerIdentifier: String? { get set }
```

## Describing containment

- **containerDisplayName**: A localized string that specifies the name of a container to which the item belongs, suitable to display in the user interface.
- **containerOrder**: The order of the item within the container.
- **containerTitle**: The title of the container to which the item belongs.
